text: Brandon Timothy Jackson is an American actor and comedian. He was born in Detroit, Michigan, USA on March 7th, 1984. He moved to Los Angeles, California at the age of 18 in pursuit of a stand-up comedy career. == Family == His parents are Beverly Yvonne and Wayne Timothy Jackson. His grandfather is Royal Titus Bozeman. All are pastors. He has six siblings, and is the fifth of the seven. He has four children. He is romantically involved with Denise Xavier. == Roles == He is most known for his roles in Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief and Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters as Grover Underwood, Tropic Thunder as Alpha Chino, Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son as Trent Pierce. He also appeared in 8 Mile, Lottery Ticket, Roll Bounce, and Tooth Fairy (2010 movie). He was an extra in Ali(2001) in the Chicago club scene. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Detroit Category:American comedians
title: Brandon T. Jackson
